testcase.classname: Book a product on Dillards shopping application
testcase.name: Order product from dillards application
testcase.system-out: Given User should be on Loging home page....................................passed When User enters "shambhu" and "java123" in text box field..................passed Then User click on login button.............................................passed When user Search "Tishirts" in search box...................................passed Then User select product and click on addToBag..............................passed And user click checkOout button.............................................passed Then User click ProceedToCheck button.......................................passed And User enters "abc@gmail.com","sham","raj","5469785266","OMR chennai","842562","chennai"and "Tamilnadu" in the address confirmation page.passed Then User enters payment details "46326962679652,"shambhu" and "544" in the payment page.passed Then User confirm the payment and placed the order..........................passed
